bvsuk.heading: An experience you'd expect from a professional tool.
bvsuk.subheading: Opinionated and designed for daily use.

cards.title: Built for speed
cards.description: Synchronized in real-time across all users. No spinners or waiting.

cards.title: Keyboard first design
cards.description: Optimized for efficiency with extensive keyboard shortcuts.

cards.title: For software teams
cards.description: Created by software people for software product teams.

cards.title: Works offline
cards.description: Access and make changes with or without internet access.

cards.title: Light and dark UI
cards.description: We have multiple themes. Use light or dark, your choice.

cards.title: Multiple teams
cards.description: Have all your teams in one shared workspace.
